column3: Amazing experience. A must in corfu.
column4: Amazing food. Amazing service. Amazing wine. Beautiful place to eat. It was such a pleasant surprise. You go through little allays and then you find this beautiful garden in a square.
Unmatched location, great service, imaginative dishes. A night to remember. Get a table outside and enjoy...you'll like it. I correct myself, you'll love it.

column3: Delicious, interesting and accomplished food with great service
column4: All the positive things said below match our own experience. Would add that sommelier recommended an excellent Greek wine well within the medium price range I stipulated. Will definitely return.
the lady who attended us has no experience to manage such a space. she placed 8 people at tables of 6 and six at tables of eight.
A fine dining twist on traditional Greek cuisine. Beautiful setting in a lovely square just off the main touristic streets. Great service and food quality. Highly recommended.
We had a wonderful evening, the service and greeting and food was all top notch. It‚Äôs been a very special evening, one of the best places to eat in Corfu no doubt about that! Thank you!

Thoroughly enjoyed every last morsel of this fabulous meal. Delicious and imaginative menu presented so beautifully. Lots of little ‚Äòextras‚Äô between courses. Sommelier recommended a delicious rose. Perfect service. It was a gorgeous night out. üíôüá¨üá∑üíô

Highly recommend this restaurant, the food was incredible but the service made it 10x better, everyone was very attentive and friendly, a special thank you to Alexandros who made us feel very welcome. The place to go if you‚Äôre in Corfu!
It's a very nice restaurant in the heart of Kerkyra,we've been here 3 times,good food, friendly owners

column3: Deserves even 2 Michelin Stars! The sommelier ist just perfect...
column4: Amazing location, a sommelier with perfect know-how; nice presentation of excellent/innovative dishes! Amazingüëèüëè
We ate here and it was very good, but not for those short of cash. Be prepared to spend at least ‚Ç¨80 per person. Haute cuisine.
10/10 restaurant. Vibe is so chilled. Food is unreal. Drinks took ages so order early and pre book as quite busy. Would recommend the dessert

So disappointed! My son organised a meal for 3 . Table was booked for 21:30, we were eventually seated at 22:10 our taxi was booked to take us back to Kalami at 23:30. Food was good , service was terrible , will not return

Really good!! Excellent service, wine and cocktails. We booked last minute so sat inside which lacked the atmosphere outside had. They accommodated vegetarian taster menu however main could have been slightly more flavoursome - all other courses were superb!!! Definitely recommend and go back
We went here as a couple for a romantic dinner and it delivered us far and beyond . The food, the service even the music. Phenomenal there is nothing more to say, only to eat, see and enjoy !

column3: What a dream our night here was!
column4: From start to finish our experience was fantastic as we celebrated our anniversary . Absolutely by far the best restaurant and service we had in quit a while ! Already made a booking for my second visit.
We were told by friends that this was the best restaurant in Corfu and they were definitely right! The food was amazing.
We had the most amazing dinner at the Venetian Well, Ari and Dimitea were wonderful and accommodating

A unique experience worth living who is on the island of Corfu!The quality of the dishes was excellent, the place was wonderful and the service and the reception was more than perfect! Many congratulations!
This restaurant is a must visit!! The overall experience is unique. The food and the service are excellent. The black orzo from the main dishes was the highlight.

Food is delicious, the place is magical. The only thing I know is that you can‚Äôt leave the island without spending an evening there. The girl in welcoming area was very friendly and helpful. Loved it!‚ù§Ô∏è
Amazing service, fantastic food and a cozy place in the middle the old town! Perfect place to relax and talk Best restaurant in corfu! Its worth the money

column3: great vibe and ambiance, but terrible food
column4: Go to Pomo d'Oro instead the food here was terrible. One meal tasted like sour water. Shame we were expecting better. We had excellent food in Greece overall though.
Having traveled the World I can only give this restaurant five stars !!! Outstanding !!! The Setting , The Staff , The food !!

We visited this restaurant based on many many recommendations from other people so it had a lot to live up to but it completely delivered! The food is delicious, perfectly proportioned and the service is friendly and warm. Would go back on a heartbeat.

column3: Excellent restaurant for a special occasion
column4: Took my wife here for her birthday dinner and was not disappointed. Excellent service and the food was superb. The whole experience was wonderful. Lovely location, there are stairs to be negotiated.
If you can actually find it, this must not be missed. Stunning food, service and wine. It is a magical, peaceful place in the middle of a busy town. I would travel to Corfu just to eat here.
This restaurant took a 60 euro deposit from me, only to email me the day before our booking to say the restaurant is closed. I am yet to receive a refund.

The location is excellent. The service was flawless and professinal. The Sommelier is professional and outstanding. The food was excellent together with wine pairing . It took to another level. It is value for money. I fully recommend it.
Beautiful courtyard setting with great food and wine. The staff was very pleasant and knowledgeable and went out fo their way to make us feel welcome.

column3: Amazing food coupled with amazing service.
column4: Me and my fianc√© came from london to eat here but unfortunately failed to book a reservation, the lovely staff offered us a table inside and continued to provide excellent service throughout. The food was also exquisite.
Great dining restaurant located in a great place. The food is absolutely delicious!! Excellent wine list and excellent service!
We were delighted to return to this old favourite and yet again, had a magical evening. Interesting menu, wonderful flavours and all served with grace and style.

column3: One of the best high end restaurants
column4: One of the best high end restaurants that should eat once in you life time. Very nicely decorated, old Venetian style , very tasty food and and an amazing wine list.

column3: Best restaurant we visited in Corfu
column4: Beautiful environment, staff with superior attention to detail, delicious food. Hope to return one day.
This restaurant is situated in the centre of town in Corfu so when you are sightseeing you can drop in for a drink and some grrek feed to keep you going.

I have eaten here on many occasions and as always the location is simply stunning. This is the nearest Corfu gets to international standard fine dining so the food, service and price are serious. But for foodies and romantics it's a treat for the senses.
We, and a lot of other people, stood outside closed doors. It said on their website that they where open....
Food was amazing , last minute reservation so we could not eat outside which was a shame. The staff were good, helpful but lacked enthusiasm.
Wonderful delicious food, outstanding charming atmosphere, great and attentive service... simply an absolute five star dining experience which I would recommend to everyone!
Greek food is good, everywhere. But at the Venetian well, Greek food is not good, but excellent! accompanied by very good wines and served with great diligence and "gentillesse"

We were in Corfu for a wedding and pre-booked a place at the Venetian Well. The food was wonderful, not enough vegetarian though, but the waiter Lefteris made our evening! Very hospitable, friendly and knowledgable - Who does not love chocolate?

column3: Excellent restaurant in the old city of Kerkyra / Corfu
column4: We wanted a good restaurant, not spaghetti for tourists. The Venetian well offers high quality food and wine in the center of the old town. Everything was excellent, very innovative, service is impeccable. Highly recommended. Make your booking by phone, not online.

We had a wonderful evening at the Venetian Well. All the courses was very good. It is a bit at the expensive side, but the quality of the food was also high. The waiters was trying, but they delivered only almost.

The real cost of this restaurant is 2 star Michelin! Of course, prices are high for Corfu, but lever of food... Every dish is an interesting adventure. Answer for advice when you choose wine, somelier works very well!
Unfortunately the restaurant was closed. The well was covered and not that big -area around the well is very pretty
The food was exceptional, the atmosphere was calm and everything seemed well taken care of. A bit pricey though.

We had a fantastic dinner accompanied with a great selection of wines which were proposed by the great sommelier. Each course was a sensation and we where definitely not the last time here!!! My favourite was the Crayfish Tartare... never had anything comparable
For our first evening in Corfu town, we opted for a special dinner. The Venetian Well exceeded my expectations. The service, selections, and atmosphere were perfect.

Tucked into this picturesque square was the best restaurant of our 4 week vacation in the eastern Mediterranean. Everything was delicious and perfect. 5-star quality and service at a 3-star price. Go there and go often. Every dish a jewel.

column3: I visit this restaurant every time I visit Corfu
column4: The dishes are of the highest quality, the wine cellar that makes any other restaurant on the island jealous and is located in the most iconic and idillic location on the island. Need to say no more.

If you are looking for a taverna with tzatziki ,souvlaki,gyros this is not the place to go .....if you are looking for a gourmet special experience this is a mast place to go.Great food , great wine selection great service ... amazing

column3: Even nice in day when shut!
column4: We only passed by here on the walk through the old town, it was closed but the Venetian well and surrounding buildings still made an impressive backdrop!

Dinner of a high standard. The ambience is good and it is clear that they take their job seriously (if not too seriously). The wine list is impressive and it is worth noting that the prices for the wine were good.

What a place! Everything was perfect: the food of course but also the service (very nice waiters) and the location. The sommelier was really helpful. I'd recommend to book it during the high season. Take your time and enjoy!

Dinner of a high standard. The ambience is good and it is clear that they take their job seriously (if not too seriously). The wine list is impressive and it is worth noting that the prices for the wine were good.
Absolutely great food, great services, great atmosphere! All dishes tasteful and hard to leave anything in the plate. Strongly recommended!

This was, by some distance, the best meal we‚Äôve had during our culinary tour of Crete. The flavours were exceptional; long, slow ‚Äòcountry‚Äô cooking, beautiful herbs, just delicious. Highly recommended
Specious place, great service, vegetarian options, tasty food with fresh ingredients with local ideology, beautifully served !

I definite must to visit. I went there on a recommendation from some fellow travellers who said it was the best food they had all this year. I asked waiter for some suggestions for food n wine and was extremely happy with my final choices.

column3: Traditional Cretan cuisine with an emphasis to Cretan Extra Virgin Olive Oil.
column4: I have dined at Peskesi numerous times, all of theme were great. Cozy, traditional ambience, cuisine that has its routes in the Cretan tradition, excellent olive oil and wine bars. A gastronomical treasure.

column3: Delicious dinner for a date night
column4: The meal and drinks were excellent, so fresh and flavorful. I would absolutely recommend eating here. I would also book ahead like we did, because it is a very popular restaurant!

So delicious food. I have tried so many Michelle star restaurants in the world. I would say that this one is very unique with its traditional cuisine and the ambient. Definitely recommend. The best in heraklion city.
Excellently combined tastes inspired by the Cretan heritage, with biological produce of their own farm, executed to perfection. Nice setting and friendly staff.

column3: You must eat here in Heraklion
column4: Great food experience with nice service and recommendations for food Reservation is mandatory to have a chance to eat here Beautiful restaurant with nice vide Great selection of local wine Slow cook goat and pork were fantastic

The place was recommended by my brother and sister in law. She was so jealous we went to Crete and especially for this place. We had so much fun. It was sooooo good. The service, the food, the drinks, everything. Great place

Unique and authentic traditional food from Crete. As a greek I‚Äôve just about tried all the cuisine, however nothing like this place, absolutely excellent. Good service and great setting in the heart of Heraklion.
Fantastic food, every plate was mouth watering. Couldn‚Äôt fault the food with anything! Service was great, wine was beautiful. We ended up booking again before we leave
An amazing experience blending traditional tastes with modern approaches! Exquisite food, delicious deserts, friendly staff, relaxing atmosphere! Absolutely woderful.
Excellent restaurant, excellent servive and excellent dishes: all ingredients are from the territory and they were perfectly cooked. Top restaurant in Heraklion!

Excellent environment, service and dishes!! We visited with family and friends and loved the private garden, the treats and the organic options... Very interesting to read the story behind the ingredients used. A must visit when in Herakleion

column3: Great Lunch after walking the city
column4: Our guide recommended Farm To Table Peskesi for lunch. Lovely location (off the tourist beaten path) staff was thoughtful and the food was great. Started with an olive oil sampling and enjoyed a light lunch with delicious dessert! Highly recommend this charming restaurant.
The food, the atmosphere, the service! If you‚Äôre looking for a cozy place to spend a quality evening this is the top choice. A place which really values their customers!
Excellente restaurant ! The food, the service and th√© place were all surprisingly good ! Recommand that beautiful restorant at 100%
Everything was amazing. An special thanks to Vasilis which was very kind Helena and Jo√£o from Portugal
The food was literally amazing the whole good experience was great one of the most amazing restaurants I‚Äôve been in my life. Well don‚Äôt to the chef and the stuff totally recommend it!!!!
excellent greek food and service and location. Nothing to complain about. Would go there again and again and...
Farm to table, authentic Cretan food we will be talking about for a long time. Service and ambiance were top notch! Not to be missed.
An authentic cretan gastronomical experience!!! Colorful tastes with unique combinations of ingredients! Service is kind and quite helpful. It totally deserves a visit!

Amazing Cretan food, made with love and extremely delicious local products. The service, the food, the environment is cretan hospitality at its best. Absolutely love the complimentary halva at the end of every meal. Keep up the good job!

column3: Great food. Great place. Great people
column4: The food is great. Amazing service. We got in the end a desert on the house. Thank you very much. You just need to order a place
Super food and hospitality from the team Warm welcome and friendly Thank you kossmas Nice place to discover local food .
Nice decoration and creative cretan cuisine in the center of Heraklion city. You must have a reservation.
Authentic delicious food.Service was very friendly and pur waiter Kosmas was the best,very professional and very kind. I would recomend this place

Delicious authentic Greek food. We found this place off a side street from the centre of Heraklion and so glad we did. Some of the best food we had on Crete. Definitely try some of the olive oil selection with a bread dip.
Service was very good, the staff was very- very friendly, dishes were delicious, i recommend for visiting üòç
Waiter spilled olive oil all over my wife‚Äôs pants and shoes. The restaurant did not apologize or do anything at all about it.
Best restaurant we went to on Island of Crete. Ordered the pork dish, the meat is so soft, it melts in the mouth.

Were in this restaurant some days before and we really love it. The food was yummy,the place great,the people very kind and everything else,was super. Yes,I would recommend this restaurant in Heraklion.

Extraordinary culinary experience. The food here is indescribably delicious. Amazing service and hospitality from our server, Kosmas! This is one of the best restaurants we have ever eaten at! Marvelous service and the food is unparalleled. Incredibly fresh, farm to table dishes.

column3: Best place to eat in Herakleio
column4: Exceptional Cretan cuisine! All the staff is very polite and quick. Greek hospitality at its finest.

column3: A cosy place with really good food
column4: A really cosy place with a nice menu. All our plates looked lovely and tasted absolutely great. Special thanks to Kosmas for his courteous Service. Best regards Timo

We had an excellent service and great experie experience at this restaurant. We first tested different olive oils with bread. The presentation was great and the flavors of the oils too. The appetizers tasted great and there was nothing wrong with the main course either
Nice atmosphere, friendly staff and good quality food. Value for money. Plenty of vegetarian options & the salad was incredible

Not a single bad word to say. Wishing other business would try to go towards this level of excellense. The food is amazing, restaurant very stylish, and cozy, portions are perfect, service out of this world. If in heraklion just go!!!
We had a great evening after several people recommended the restaurant to us. The food was great, location was beautiful and the service was outstanding. Thanks to our waiter Kosmas!
Visited in October, food was fantastic but the service from Kostas was excellent. His recommendations were exactly what I wanted. Best restaurant we visited during our trip

Traditional and delicious cretan food. The staff really cares about the food they are sending out to you, and the little traditional hand towel they give you after your meal is so cute and thoughtful!

column3: The one restaurant you have to visit in your life
column4: Best food we‚Äôve had in a while. Superb quality. They even gave us a nice dessert at no extra cost as well. Love the experience. Highly recommend ! Ask for Dolmades, that‚Äôs marinated with local herbs. You won‚Äôt regret it.

column3: Nice, wholesome food and good service
column4: Nice, local food cooked really well with great service. A nice atmosphere with friendly service and a nice wine list. Food presented really well. Was very busy but they squeezed me in without a reservation.
Excellent food for people that want to feel what the greek food is like but also with a gourmet touch. I absolutely loved it
The serving is perfect and the food is verry good. I recomand when you visit to eat here at least once. The goat and the pig were awsome.

This is such a nice restaurant; brilliant atmosphere and the food was delicious. We had the goat and the lamb for main; both highly recommended! The service was fantastic, with little touches and extras which didn‚Äôt go unnoticed!
We liked the food and ambiance do much we went back for a second visit. Note that it‚Äôs a little hard to find because it is a little off the main streets, but worth the effort.

Wonderful menu, wonderful food, wonderful atmosphere, wonderful service, and staff! Period. Go here when in town, we believe you won't regret it! We ate here three out of four nights of our stay in Crete.

column3: One of the best city rest
column4: One of the best rest in Heraklion. Good fast and polite staff ( we have very funny guy Kosmos). Delicious food and good quality üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª many thanks

Wonderful concept. Biological own farm products from farm to table. It definitely shows in the taste. Everything we tried was absolutely top notch. From salads, cheeses meats to vegetables. Will definitely go again
Hands down one of the best restaurant we've been in Crete (or entire Greece trip). Make sure to make reservation as they turn people away during peak season. Cheesecake was out of this world!!
Delicious local food, nice location and awesome staff (especially kosmos). The interior was very nice.
So clearly this restaurant doesn't need another review but it's that great that I couldn't help myself. Ambiance, FOOD, and Service ... It has it all.

Went here after the hint received from a local. Excellent Cretan food focused more on meat than fish. The setting is lovely and rustically. Service is good. Reservation is highly recommended especially at busy hours.
Amazing place, food excellent, the staff are great, nice and helpful. We will want back here soon üòäüòäüòä

Hello, it‚Äôs probably on top 3 restaurants in Heraklion. All products are magnified by respectful cuisine. We have been so lucky to have a table during this to short trip. Thanks to all the great team Fabrice

column3: Pretty, romantic bar/restaurant in the city centre.
column4: Lovely restaurant; everything bio & local. Delicious nicely presented dishes. Very friendly helpful staff, accommodating to vegans, gluten free etc. Great place !
Great restaurant with very authentic atmosphere, delicious food and greatest quality in everything! Especially would like to mention Kosmas, for his excellent service and high professionalism.
Cretan authentic cuisine. Good service and interesting food. You should try the goat with yougurt, it was very good. And also the lamb. You need reservation.
Peskesi well worth the visit! Amazing restaurant, fab food and wine, friendly staff and fast service. Best value for you money, great place, recomennded!

column3: Excellent food, great atmosphere for a business dinner
column4: Great food and a lovely location in the city center, with excellent service by Kosmas, who is very professional yet very friendly, always ready to help and assist the guest in any way necessary, thank you team and Kosmas, and see you again soon!
